page.title: 17POLITICS IN THE BUSBY AREA
page.content: The{White Cart Water}is a{political {boundary}at all levels of government. The area is part of two{Parliamentary Constituencies,Eastwood(west bank) and East Kilbride(east bank). Eastwood has a{Conservative}M.P.who is a Government Minister while East Kilbride has a {Labour}M.P..This difference is seen at {Regional}level,the{Councillor}for Eastwood South is a Conservative while the Councillor for Murray and Avondale is Labour.Busby's representative on Eastwood{District Council}is an Independent supported by the Residents' Association while the area on the east bank is represented by a Conservative Councillor on East Kilbride District Council. The{Community Councils}are{non {-political.}Here also the boundary creates a division with a Community Council on either side.
